医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
世卫组织就伪造索马鲁肽发出医疗产品警报世界卫生组织 (WHO) 发布了关于伪造索马鲁肽的医疗产品警报，这种药物在一些国家用于治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-issues-medical-product-alert-on-falsified-semaglutides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-issues-medical-product-alert-on-falsified-semagluides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de151ea1-6ce7-4891-b17a-f2f0274cda53 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:07:13 -0400 WHO issues medical product alert on falsified semaglutides
世界卫生组织赞扬乍得消除昏睡病世界卫生组织（WHO）祝贺乍得消除了冈比亚人类非洲锥虫病（也称为昏睡病）这一公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-commends-Chad-for-eradicating-sleeping-sickness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-commends-Chad-for-eradicating-sleeping-sickness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0eb787b6-98ce-44eb-9bcf-e64a89307294 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:02:09 -0400 WHO commends Chad for eradicating sleeping sickness
原发性硬化性胆管炎患者胆管癌治疗的挑战原发性硬化性胆管炎 (PSC) 是一种罕见的进行性肝病，会损害胆管并显着增加胆管癌的风险，特别是胆管癌 (CCA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Challenges-in-treatment-of-cholangiocarcinoma-in-病人-with-primary-sclerosing-cholangitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Challenges-in-treatment-of-cholangiocarcinoma-in-病人-with-primary-sclerosing-cholangitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b45532f-e8b8-41d1-ae32-e2b664225845 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 13:49:44 -0400 Challenges in treatment of cholangiocarcinoma in patients with primary sclerosing cholangitis
揭示 SOS 基因在抗生素治疗期间大肠杆菌存活中的作用当大肠杆菌检测到其遗传物质受损时，它会发出 SOS 信号，改变细胞内的活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Unveiling-the-role-of-SOS-genes-in-E-coli-survival-during-antibiotic-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Unveiling-the-role-of-SOS-genes-in-E-coli-survival-during-antibiotic-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2586f1ea-2076-4542-ab61-267ced78e486 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 13:42:58 -0400 Unveiling the role of SOS genes in E. coli survival during antibiotic treatment
绝经前卵巢切除术会降低晚年大脑白质的完整性在绝经前（尤其是 40 岁之前）切除卵巢的女性，在以后的生活中大脑多个区域的白质完整性会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/绝经前-卵巢切除术-减少-white-matter-integrity-in-the-brain-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/绝经前-卵巢切除术-减少-white-matter-integrity-in-the-brain-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23ab6169-ce52-4323-92fb-3c3740d786b7 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 13:33:15 -0400 Premenopausal oophorectomy reduces white matter integrity in the brain later in life
“合理设计”酶以提高性能的新方法科学家们已经开发出一种“合理设计”酶的新方法原型，以提高酶的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Novel-method-for-rationally-engineering-enzymes-to-deliver-improved-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Novel-method-for-rationally-engineering-enzymes-to-deliver-improved-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a1ac186-6498-4423-a91d-c86f32454b68 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 13:28:18 -0400 Novel method for 'rationally engineering' enzymes to deliver improved performance
有吸引力的外表如何导致年轻人更危险的行为新的研究挑战了美貌是幸福的关键这一观念。事实证明，有吸引力的外表会导致年轻人做出更多危险的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/How-attractive-appearance-leads-to-more-risky-behavior-among-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/How-attractive-appearance-leads-to-more-risky-behavior-among-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dcce5fe-30fe-4822-b5d5-fa1127a3b10f Thu, 20 Jun 2024 13:22:36 -0400 How attractive appearance leads to more risky behavior among young people
研究揭示咖啡与肥胖和药物滥用等有害健康结果之间的遗传关联科学家们发现，在欧洲血统的美国和英国成年人中，咖啡摄入量与药物滥用和肥胖始终存在正向遗传相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Study-reveals-genic-associations- Between-coffee-and-harmful-health-outcomes-such-as-obesity-and-substance-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Study-reveals-genic-associations- Between-coffee-and-harmful-health-outcomes-such-as-obesity-and-substance-use.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bea593a2-8ca0-4066-a5ec-f3400de6d839 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 11:16:00 -0400 Study reveals genetic associations between coffee and harmful health outcomes such as obesity and substance use
克赖斯特彻奇变体的一份副本可能有助于预防家族性阿尔茨海默病一个始于一名非凡患者身上的发现的科学故事现在正在取得成功。 2019 年，一个由来自两家麻省总医院的研究人员组成的国际团队 -； Mass Eye and Ear 和麻省总医院 (MGH)-；报道了一位患者的案例，她直到 70 多岁才出现认知障碍，尽管她的家庭有患早发性阿尔茨海默病的极高遗传风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/One-copy-of-the-Christchurch-variant-may-confer-protection-against-familial-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/One-copy-of-the-Christchurch-variant-may-confer-protection-against-familial-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=000dca4f-7fdb-4fe4-a695-1bd05bfc2a35 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 10:32:44 -0400 One copy of the Christchurch variant may confer protection against familial Alzheimer's disease
采用叶酸充分有效的强化有助于预防出生缺陷英国政府未能在所有面粉和大米中添加维生素叶酸，“将导致每年更多本来可以预防的死亡和出生缺陷”，尼古拉斯·沃尔德教授今天在《英国医学杂志》上表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Adopting-complete- effective-fortification-with-folic-acid-can-help-prevent-birth-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Adopting-complete- effective-fortification-with-folic-acid-can-help-prevent-birth-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=789738a4-31ec-48b4-b383-d5449cbd1c87 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 10:26:52 -0400 Adopting fully effective fortification with folic acid can help prevent birth defects
